title: FunToken (FUN) - Bullish divergence
name: without_worries
contents:
Following a 80% correction since the giddy heights of April 2021 a number of reasons now exist to be bullish on price action with the above 2-day chart. They include:

1) A ‘incredible buy’ signal prints. Look left!

2) Regular bullish divergence . 8 oscillators are currently printing bullish divergence .

3) similar story on the 2-day BTC pair (below)

Is it possible price action falls further? For sure.

Is it probable? Unlikely.

Good luck!

Ww


2-day BTC pair
Trade active
Trade active: ** life cross ** pints on the daily chart on the BTC pair.
Comment: On the BTC pair price action is up 70% since publishing - continues to look very strong.
Trade active: resistance breakout, a significant move should print soonish
Comment: Price action on the weekly is close to breakout on the falling wedge. When that happens a 20 cent target is forecast.
Trade active: Past resistance confirmed as support.
Comment: Say what you want about this token, it has been a steady Eddie for the last 4-5 months.

title: Gold (Expected Double bottom).
name: usmand
contents:
Gold has Placed 1729 and moved significantly downwards from Bullish Trend Exhaustion area at 1733, where traders have made their money a see a potential risk, so they decide to start taking profit.
Moreover, it has already broke the Important key level at 1688 and indicates that gold is still in Bearish bias.

So,
we are expecting that the market is going to create the double bottom at 1624,
but before the retest of its broken structure at 1688.

You can take a chance of little buying from 1662-58 (Buying Zone) till 1688 (Broken structure).

Risk Warning!
Trading leveraged products such as Forex and CFDs may not be suitable for all investors as they carry a high degree of risk to your capital.

title: Intraday study for Indian indices foe 11th October 2022
name: Harshit_Saxena
contents:
HI good morning

yesterday TCS posted its quarterly results and Q2 and the numbers are better than the estimated by the big brokerages and they also said that the attrition is peak out and in all way the number looks good So i am bullish on CNXIT is looking good and maintaining my strong view on it and for today i also consider the buy on the INFY and the HCL tech apart with this all IT is looking good So buy the dips as it shows the good bounce The INFY has the most strong data as the yesterday close and all da there is a major long buildup along with some short buildup so it is in favor in bulls the up and down move both trigger the short covering in the market look at the options trade

As we talk about the nifty the 17100is very strong support along with 17200 so we may see a dip towards 17165-17180 which is a good bounce back level and the resistance is at 17315 and then 17425

if we talk abut bout the bank nifty then the 38800-39000 is a good support range then the 39300-39500-39800 is the string resistance

Disclaimer -- I may have some positions in some of highlighted stocks and this is only study for understanding purposed of the data and the patterns I am not saying anyone to buy any of these picks discussed here i am not SEBI Registered
Comment: those who will say tat IT will nor sustain and see the gap down it doesn't have strength now see the CNXIT

Comment: CNXIT returning from over bought zone in my time frame charts

and as the INFY crosses 1464 in futures then we see a sharp up move in it be quick it is the opportunity
Comment: 17139 is for nifty
Comment: data is negative may broke 17100 and go towards 17025-50 levels for support

title: EURUSD short term sell opportunity!!
name: nezam02
contents: EURUSD 4H has given us a short-term sell opportunity as the price has grabbed liquidity multiple times and is currently just completed another false breakout. Upon closing of this candle, we could see a drop for at least the short term to the 0.9680 level!

title: BTC Short squeeze potential remains 20.8-21.8k
name: AssetMasteryandInvesting
contents:
Hi Traders,

Our BTC shorts from 20.3k are looking good, but I am taking slight profits and hedging with small long positions on short trades of present since we still may see the 20.8-21.8k area hit in a short quick squeeze.

Until another market catalyst spooks the market or FED pivoting is crushed we still have upward potential in the air.

Hedge long BTC @19.1k
SL 18.5k
TP 20.8-21.8k

Goodluck,

Asset Mastery

title: BALUSDT
name: FiboTech
contents:
Hello my dear friends

Well, we will check one of the most negative of the month (:
The support range of $4.945 has been maintained and a positive RSI divergence has been issued in the four-hour timeframe.
If the current trend is above the blue range ($5.302), there is a high probability of forming an upward trend similar to the drawn scenario.

We would be happy to hear your comments.

Trade active: The price trend went above the blue range!
Now we can enter by observing the loss limit on the specified range

Comment: It is better to wait for the break of the trend line to enter the trade
As long as our loss limit is maintained, the trade is valid
Comment: It is true that our loss limit has not been activated yet, but it seems that considering the momentum of the downward trend, the above view has expired.

title: ETH Potential downsides
name: Dean_Kao
contents:
ETH daily chart

ETH is currently in a consolidation, if the price goes up to test the supply area, it will be a good shorting opportunity

Enter the market with the signal as if you are shorting, do not go short directly

Signals can be: engulfing , head and shoulder , pin bar , fibo,QM, etc...up to you

TP1. 1231
TP2. 1116

The above is sheerly a personal analysis, only for reference.
Please make sure your per trade risk 1~3%

title: USDCAD-Trend line breakout
name: FxWirePro
contents: It is good to buy on dips around 1.36700 with SL around 1.3630 for the TP of 1.3800
